INVOKE.COMMENT: check port 80 is available, log success/failure

Values.value: port 80 is unavailable, restart apache at /usr/sbin/apachectl

MAP.COMMENT: Flag that we did get some applicable device in page

BRANCH.COMMENT: Only poll bridge if flagged as provisioned

array.name: field_options
array.value: skip and run at next scheduled interval

record.value: Input must be in YYYY/MM/DD format
Input must be in HH:MM:SS format

BRANCH.COMMENT: Quit loop if we have gone past last page i.e. results == 0
